ygData.subject: Re: Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: Since it only costs about 30 to 50pp to master brewing (and alcohol tolerance at the same time), I am going to test this theory pretty soon. -Shadowwalker
ygData.messageBody:
Since it only costs about 30 to 50pp to master brewing (and alcohol
tolerance at the same time), I am going to test this theory pretty soon.

-Shadowwalker


> > Gregory Egan wrote:
> >
> > Hi all,
> >
> > Just discovered that Elven Wine gives a small mana regen boost. My
> > alcohol tolerance is so low though I take an INT hit when I use it, so
> > I only do it when mana is really low, so by time I am FM my INT has
> > recovered too. Never thought I would be using alcohol like warriors do
> > for STR boost, so neglected to build alcohol tolerance. But now it is
> > in upper 20's and INT hit is not as bad, and recovers faster. Anyway,
> > it is like a poor cousin to Clarity, but helps a bit when you are
> > soloing and want mana back ASAP.
> >
> > Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
>
> Can anyone confirm this? It sounds too good to be true... My Tolerance
> is in it's 30's (I'm a party boy) but you better believe it will be
> maxed by tomorrow if this is true. :)
>
> --
> Sergey
>
> Worker bees can leave
> Even drones can fly away
> The queen is their slave
>
>
